title: Lunchbox Reveals The Name Of His New Baby + Joe Exotic’s Husband Joins Us + Raymundo’s Wedding May Be Postponed
itunes:title: Lunchbox Reveals The Name Of His New Baby + Joe Exotic’s Husband Joins Us + Raymundo’s Wedding May Be Postponed
description:
We got a voicemail from a listener who wanted to know about Lunchbox’s second baby so he revealed the name for the first time. We walk to Dillon Passage of 'Tiger King' fame. He's married to Joe Exotic who's currently serving a 22 year prison sentence. He talks to us about how they met, Joe being locked up and whether or not he thinks Carole Baskin killer her husband. Plus, Raymundo gives us an update on his wedding. It's planned for October, but now may be delayed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
